Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer:
EIP.Tools makes searching & learning about EIPs & ERCs quick.

It even indexes the EIPs that are still in the PR stage making them easily shareable with the community.

The EIP_GPT allows anyone to get the info about EIPs in a short and concise manner.
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer:
The main focus with this tools is User Experience.
It makes searching all the EIPs & ERCs easier via a search box that handles both the EIP numbers as well as titles.

The EIP status is also visible within in the search itself.

There's also a 3D EIPs dependency graph that makes visualizing the interconnected nature of EIPs & ERCs much easier.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer:
The official EIPs website hosted at ethereum.org lacks a lot of search functionality which this project solves.

On sharing the EIP pages via EIP.Tools, unique metadata image with the EIP title and status is generated which isn't the case with the official EIP website.

Also all the links work as Farcaster frame.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer: The grants will help the project keep up to date as new EIPs are created or modified.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer:
EIP.Tools provides an alternative interface for browsing EIPs and ERCs increasing the decentralization of the information in the case the official site ever got down.

The entire project is open source so anyone can fork and keep it live forever.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: EIP.Tools
project.description:
EIP.Tools is an all-in-one website to view EIPs, ERCs, CAIPs, and RIPs.

âœ¨ The main differentiator is that we index the proposed EIPs as well, when they are in the PR stage and not merged in the official github repo. The ethereum.org website doesn't show those EIPs but you can see them first on EIP.Tools!

ðŸ¤– EIP_GPT: allows you to get a gist of any EIP in a short & condensed summary.

Other Features include:
- Top Trending EIPs in the last 7 days
- Easy to use search bar to search any EIP by number or title
- "EIP of the day" section to learn about a new EIP every day
- Reading List: bookmark EIPs to your reading list, and instantly read later
- Works as Farcaster Frame
- Dedicated section for the Pectra Hardfork
- Stumble upon random EIPs
